flawed_nl_solution:
At least one person lives in 85/100 * 120 = <<85/100*120=102>>102 apartments.
At least two persons live in 60/100 * 120 = <<60/100*120=600/3>>600/3 apartments.
So in every of the 102 - 600/3 = <<-98*1=-98>>-98 apartments, only one person is living.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 72, not 600/3. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
